titleStmt.title: Curiosities: or the cabinet of nature Containing phylosophical, naturall, and morall questions fully answered and resolved. Translated out of Latin, French, and Italian authors. By R.B. Gent. Never before published.
titleStmt.author: Basset, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. and I. Okes,

Running title reads: Curiosities of nature.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
